page.title: 06UNEMPLOYMENT IN HAVANT
page.content: Today,July 1985 there are over 3 million people out of work.This has been caused by two major factors.The first is the closure of large_scale industrial factories;the second the increasing use of computers in business.In the Havant area there are about 4 thousand people without jobs. The Government have set up a scheme to help the young people who have not got jobs.It is called the Youth Training Scheme.School leavers can go on to the scheme for a year.In this year they start to learn a trade and some companies retain them on a permanent basis.They get Â£25 a week. From the school leavers at Warblington 19 of them are going on the YTS,83 of them are going on to college,18 of them have jobs to go to and 24 of them are unemployed.
